Summary: very large craft and contact with life from within
trends: There have been no other sightings in Pike Creek
This sighting has been favorited 4 times.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was on the pa turn pike and pulled off on the first rest and refreshment stop and got out of my car and i wondered what all of the noise i was hearing was about! after looking up at the direction the noise was coming from i saw what i thought was a train because it seemed to be one of those trains that have over 100 cars and very long but covered by fog but i could see large parts of it clearly. the time at this point is about 905pm just then a small person seem to just appeared and he told me he was the FBI i needed to come with him and i believe i refused and he said he would force me to if necessary and the next thing i know i am on the ship. one thing i can recall clearly is when they copied all of my memory's i was feeling violated and if you will raped mentally. the next thing i know i am back in my car in the driver seat and awake and the time now is 1030pm. i started the car and felt the need to get the hell out of here! however i did not know why at the time, i felt very very confused and nervous when i drove away from the area.
